name: ICS Group
overview: ICS Group is a business group is an integrated service provider in the real estate and financial service sector. The service it offers includes Property management, Parking Consultancy & Management, Hospitality Services, Corporate Finance and Asset Management. With the objective of redefining the retail infrastructure space, it has strategically tied up with the top international companies. Old Mutual Property, South Africa for property development and management and Asset Management, Secure Parking, Australia for car park management and Mantis International, South Africa for hospitality are some of its tie- ups. The company has its headquarters located in Mumbai and has offices in Delhi, Pune and Bangalore along with its representation offices in South Africa. Its projects are present in over 25 cities in the country. It was the foremost company to provide integrated ‘Infrastructure Solutions’ encompassing a wide range of retail developmental needs. With its knowledge of international business, it has been able to provide innovative solutions and strategic insights in each of its businesses.
